Gil, new target: M9. Please handle.

Created an attachment (id=30174)
changes for the jst ws

This bug was caused by the proxy not being generated and this not being taken
into account when the testfacility is chosen. The code was choosing the jsps
even though there was no proxy.

Created an attachment (id=30175)
this is the consumption plugin part of the fix

Created an attachment (id=30176)
this is the consumption ui part of the fix

Gil, thanks for the fix. I'm accepting this back into assigned state on your 
behalf to indicate that patches are available to be committed. Please don't 
resolve bugs until a committer such as Kathy or I has committed and released 
the fix and added a remark to that effect.

new cons ui

I've tested with the newest patch.  Now if I go through a Web service scenario 
not selecting "generate proxy" but select "test Web service", I would not get 
the NPE on AddModuleDependencyCommand.  However, I ran into defect 116340 
(which was problem with launching WSE from the Web service wizard) and was not 
able to get through with the scenario.  So the net is, since this fix does not 
buy the user much as far as getting through the scenario, I would hold off 
applying this patch for M9 until the fix for 116340 is found.

Patches reviewed, committed and released to I build together with 116340 as 
v2005118_1654.
